name: Pango Blocks
summary:
LOGIC and cheerfulness!

Get ready for a challenge! CHOOSE logic blocks and BUILD a path for Pango. 
If Pango crosses the screen without falling, he will catch an item and give it to a friend.

Pango will have to bring back 8 ingredients to Pig's kitchen, 8 tools for Fox's rocket, sports equipment for Squirrel, and crayons for Rabbit's drawing…

More than 40 challenges through 5 funny adventures.

Educational game suitable for children 3 or older with 2 difficulty levels.

Pango Blocks - a cute way to learn about judging distances when you're little!

FEATURES:

- Logic game
- 5 adventures to discover for your enjoyment
- 40 challenges through 5 universes
- 2 difficulty levels
- Perfect for children 3 or older
- No stress and no timer
- A simple, functional application
- Colorful and fully interactive game
- Fully animated with sound and pictures
- Internal parental control
- No in-game purchases and no invasive advertising
